channel.title: How do i raise max hits of range
channel.description: i am not sure if this is ment to be here if its not can a admin move it i need help raiseing the max hit on range i am useing project 16 v.6 and all it hits with range is 0 i want to know how to make it hit harder please help

item.title: How do i raise max hits of range
item.dc:creator: @craig187 craig187
item.description:
@craig187 wrote:

i done that but it didn’t work could anyone send me a pic of that code on a server that has working range so i can just copy it

Read full topic

item.title: How do i raise max hits of range
item.dc:creator: @bobbymoore64 bobbymoore64
item.description:
@bobbymoore64 wrote:

[quote=“cook, post:4, topic:50563”]orrrrr just open client and find public void CalculateRange() { and then to were it says MaxHit += (double)(1.05 + (double)((double)(RangeBonus * Range) * 0.001)); } (note: the 1.05 might not be the same)

and change the 1.05 to what you want :)[/quote][b]yes well done
btw yes this is the right part of the forums

bobby,[/b]

Read full topic
item.source: How do i raise max hits of range

item.title: How do i raise max hits of range

@cook wrote:

orrrrr just open client and find public void CalculateRange() { and then to were it says MaxHit += (double)(1.05 + (double)((double)(RangeBonus * Range) * 0.001)); } (note: the 1.05 might not be the same)

and change the 1.05 to what you want
